## âœ… Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project (PEP 8, Black formatting)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added type hints where appropriate

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on the OASIS-1 dataset (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added docstrings to new functions/classes
- [ ] I have updated README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated ARCHITECTURE.md (if architectural changes)

### Scientific Integrity

- [ ] My changes are scientifically sound and well-justified
- [ ] I have cited relevant papers or methods (if applicable)
- [ ] I have considered potential bias and fairness issues
- [ ] I have maintained patient privacy (no identifiable data)

### Dependencies

- [ ] My changes do not introduce new dependencies
- [ ] OR: New dependencies are justified and added to requirements.txt
- [ ] OR: I have verified new dependencies have no known security vulnerabilities
